scripts.mock: cp -pvf node_modules/octicons/octicons/octicons.{css,eot,svg,ttf,woff} design && jade -w design & stylus design/main.styl -I node_modules/nib/lib -w -c & npm run serve -- --files 'design/**/*.{styl,jade}' --server design
scripts.start: npm run cp-octicons && npm run jade-w & npm run stylus-w & npm run watchify & npm run serve -- --files 'src/**/*.{styl,jade,coffee,cjsx}' --server public
scripts.build-css: npm run stylus && cat node_modules/octicons/octicons/octicons.css public/css/main.css | cleancss -o public/css/main.min.css
scripts.build-js: browserify src/js/main.cjsx -t coffee-reactify -t react-jade --extension='.cjsx' --extension='.coffee' | uglifyjs -m -c warnings=false --comments '/\/*!/' > public/js/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run cp-octicons && npm run jade && npm run replace-min && npm run replace-css && npm run build-css && npm run build-js
